snippet: Steve Mann, considered by many to be the world’s first cyborg, sits down to discuss augmented reality, wearable Apple and Google products, and the idea of connecting computers to the brain.
abstract: Steve Mann, considered by many to be the world’s first cyborg, sits down to discuss augmented reality, wearable Apple and Google products, and the idea of connecting computers to the brain.

headline.main: One on One: Steve Mann, Wearable Computing Pioneer
